languages.text: {n}Когда последняя фигура с непринужденным изяществом замирает в ритуальной позе, взволнованный ропот разливается по офицерской палубе. С благоговейным трепетом офицеры шепчут молитвы {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Богу-Императору{/g}.{/n}

{n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда последняя фигура с непринужденным изяществом замирает в ритуальной позе, взволнованный ропот разливается по офицерской палубе. С благоговейным трепетом офицеры шепчут молитвы {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Богу-Императору{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When the last of the figures freezes in a ceremonial pose with natural elegance, an anxious murmur runs across the officers' deck. The officers whisper prayers to the God-Emperor in pious trepidation.{/n}

{n}When the last of the figures freezes in a ceremonial pose with natural elegance, an anxious murmur runs across the officers' deck. The officers whisper prayers to the God-Emperor in pious trepidation.{/n}
{n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the God-Emperor.{/n}
{n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the God-Emperor.{/n}

{n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}

{n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout l'équipage présent sur le pont observe avec émerveillement la dernière silhouette prendre une pose cérémoniale dans un mouvement plein de grâce. Parmi les chuchotements d'excitation, il vous semble entendre des prières adressées à l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Empereur-Dieu{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout l'équipage présent sur le pont observe avec émerveillement la dernière silhouette prendre une pose cérémoniale dans un mouvement plein de grâce. Parmi les chuchotements d'excitation, il vous semble entendre des prières adressées à l'Empereur-Dieu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los presentes en la cubierta observan con admiración a la última figura, que adopta con gracilidad una pose ceremonial. Algunos oficiales susurran con entusiasmo, mientras que otros murmuran plegarias al {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Dios Emperador{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los presentes en la cubierta observan con admiración a la última figura, que adopta con gracilidad una pose ceremonial. Algunos oficiales susurran con entusiasmo, mientras que otros murmuran plegarias al Dios Emperador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}最后一个人影优雅地摆出仪式的姿态，甲板上所有船员都敬畏地看着他们。一部分军官兴奋地低声耳语，而其他军官则低声向{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}神皇{/g}祈祷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最后一个人影优雅地摆出仪式的姿态，甲板上所有船员都敬畏地看着他们。一部分军官兴奋地低声耳语，而其他军官则低声向神皇祈祷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}デッキのにいた人々は、最後の人物が優雅に儀式のポーズをとるのを畏敬の念を持って見守る。興奮してささやく士官もいれば、{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}神帝陛下{/g}への祈りをつぶやく者もいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デッキのにいた人々は、最後の人物が優雅に儀式のポーズをとるのを畏敬の念を持って見守る。興奮してささやく士官もいれば、神帝陛下への祈りをつぶやく者もいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alle an Deck sehen ehrfürchtig zu, wie die letzte Gestalt anmutig eine zeremonielle Pose einnimmt. Einige der Offiziere wispern aufgeregt, andere murmeln Gebete zum {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Gottimperator{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alle an Deck sehen ehrfürchtig zu, wie die letzte Gestalt anmutig eine zeremonielle Pose einnimmt. Einige der Offiziere wispern aufgeregt, andere murmeln Gebete zum Gottimperator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silüetlerden sonuncusu da zarafetle tören pozu verirken güvertedekiler huşu içinde izliyor. Subaylardan kimisi heyecanla fısıldarken kimisi de kısık sesle {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Tanrı İmparator'a{/g} dua ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those on the deck watch in awe as the final figure moves gracefully into a ceremonial pose. Some of the officers whisper in excitement, while others murmur prayers to the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}God-Emperor{/g}.{/n}
